introduction.title: About us
introduction.description: On behalf of and under the supervision of swisstopo COGIS (Coordination, Geoinformation and Services) and KGK (Conference of Cantonal Geoinformation and Cadastral Offices), a new organisation is being created in the area of (geo) standards and INTERLIS governance. The Geostandards.ch office organises and coordinates the work with the help of the thematic leaderships listed below.

button.label: Implementation of the Swiss Geoinformation Strategy

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Version 1.0 of the GeoStandards.ch strategy was approved on 07.06.2021. It comprises 2 pages and defines 8 basic strategic principles for GeoStandards.ch.

button.label: Consult the strategic plan - DE only (PDF – 900kb)

organization.title: Organisation
organization.description: Version 1.0 of the GeoStandards.ch organisational concept was approved on 08.07.2021. It comprises 33 pages and contains an introduction, a situation analysis, a desired state and a transition concept.

button.label: Consult the organisation plan - DE only (PDF – 1.2mb)

team.title: Working group
team.description: The GeoStandards.ch team is structured around 4 axes:
